overview.en: YYE is the 'electricity production incentive' token (power mining production tool). Investors can leverage YYE to provide working capital (liquidity) of a certain period for infrastructure projects. They can hence obtain a certain percentage (80%by default) of electricity profit in that fixed period of time and receive all YYE staked after the investment project expires.
overview.zh: YYE 是一元電力電力激勵生產代幣，投資者可透過抵押 YYE，提供基礎設施規模化計畫案一定期間的週轉資金（流動性），獲取一定時間內一定比例（預設 80%）的電力營收分潤，待到期滿領回所抵押之 YYE。
